April 29, 2024 - Creative Health Care Management (CHCM) is a private U.S. corporation, which provides consultation and training in the health care sector. CHCM is based in Bloomington, Minnesota. Founded in 1982 by Marie Manthey, it was originally called Creative Nursing Management.
